info.title: Press Association Olympics API v2
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs. The Press Association Olympics API provides information about events, venues, disciplines, results and athletes.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Return a list of all available Olympic Games.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

get.summary: Return the details of a selected Olympic Games.

parameters.name: gamesID
parameters.description: The identifier for the selected Olympic Games. For example 2012Â­-summerâolympics.

get.summary: Return a list of recently awarded medals ordered b...
get.description: Return a list of recently awarded medals ordered by date and time descending. The medals have key information such as the winning country and team/competitor (including any records set in the event unit).

parameters.name: gamesID
parameters.description: The identifier for the selected Olympic Games. For example 2012-Â­summerâolympics.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

get.summary: Return a list of upcoming event units at a selecte...
get.description: Return a list of upcoming event units at a selected Olympic Games. An âupcoming statusâ includes the following status types: âPlannedâ, âScheduledâ, âDelayedâ, âCancelledâ, âPostponedâ and âRescheduledâ.

parameters.name: gamesID
parameters.description: The identifier for the selected Olympic Games. For example 2012-Â­summerâolympics.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

get.summary: Return a list of event units that are currently li...
get.description: Return a list of event units that are currently live at a selected Olympic Games. A âlive statusâ includes the following status types: âRunningâ and âUnofficialâ.

parameters.name: gamesID
parameters.description: The identifier for the selected Olympic Games. For example 2012-Â­summerâolympics.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

get.summary: Return a list of event units that have recently be...
get.description: Return a list of event units that have recently been set to a result status at a selected Olympic Games. A âresult statusâ includes the following status types: âOfficialâ and âProtestedâ.

parameters.name: gamesID
parameters.description: The identifier for the selected Olympic Games. For example 2012Â­-summerâolympics.

get.summary: Return a detailed medal table for a Country at the...
get.description: Return a detailed medal table for a Country at the selected Olympic Games. A detailed medal table contains the event units in which the medals were awarded.
